nodes.text: The Thyrsus Sun Guard was a mercenary company whose history spanned several millennia. Sometimes mistaken for their rivals the Mandalorians, they notably fought for the Galactic Republic under General Solomahal during the Clone Wars. At the same time, they were also secret agents of the Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Sidious, even providing inspiration for his own red-robed Royal Guard.
The Thyrsus Sun Guard first appeared in Star Wars canon in the sourcebook Collapse of the Republic released on June 28, 2019.
In Star Wars Legends, the Thyrsus Sun Guard are known as the Sun Guard.
